body.name: Everyone 3-in-1 Soap, Body Wash, Bubble Bath, Shampoo, 32 Ounce (Pack of 2), Citrus and Mint, Coconut Cleanser with Plant Extracts and Pure Essential Oils
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: Contains: (2) 32 Ounce 100% Recycled Plastic Bottles of Everyone 3in1 Citrus and Mint Soap. For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. New Look, Same Great Product

Scent: Everyone 3in1 Citrus and Mint Soap blends the mood lifting brightness of orange pure essential oil with the soothing alertness of peppermint and the calming zen of lavender for a well-rounded, balanced clean

Use: Our 3in1 Soap is a bright do-it-all cleanser that will give you and your family a refresh from head to toe. Whether as a body wash, shampoo or bubble bath, the cooling freshness of peppermint pure essential oil and the uplifting burst of citrus will enliven your hair and skin
Clean Promise: Everyone 3in1 Soap is EWG verified, GMO free, cruelty free, gluten free, triclosan free, and synthetic fragrance free
Zero Waste Mission: In 2019, we diverted 90% of our waste from landfills. Our packaging is made from recycled material. We always use 100% recyclable packaging for order shipping, too
body.description: This is not your average soap. Everyone 3 in 1 Soaps combine gentle coconut cleansers, organic plant extracts, and vitamins E and B5 to nourish skin and hair while cleansing it of the day’s dirt and impurities. We know life gets crazy, that’s why our convenient 3-in-1 soaps work great as a shampoo, body wash, bubble bath, and even shave gel for a simplified routine. Plus, less bottles mean less plastic. At EO Products, we believe the best resources come from nature. That is why we are committed to our zero-waste mission. Our products are always made with reduction and repurposing in mind, this includes our recyclable packaging. Since 1995, we've made our products from domestic and imported ingredients in our family-owned and -operated factory in San Rafael, California. We learned early on that the only way to meet our own high standards was to take responsibility for everything ourselves. From our family to yours, enjoy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: #EveryoneCares Everyone has been putting the care into body care products since 2012. We believe that all families deserve the best for their bodies, that's why we use plant-based ingredients. Prioritizing People + Planet We say YEP to botanical extracts and pure essential oils, and NOPE to animal testing, synthetic fragrances, parabens, dyes and phthalates. 100% Recycled Bottle Our bottles are now made from previously-used recycled plastic, with a dark amber color that keeps UV rays away from the natural ingredients inside.
Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this soap! Great soap, works great as a man's shampoo also!
reviews.reviewText: We love this soap in the citrus and mint scent. My son, who is 10, has been using it as his bath soap and shampoo for years now (I think probably 3 or 4 years now?) - and he won't use anything else. He has sensitive skin and it's always been just right for him. It smells wonderful, leaves him squeaky clean, and it so easy for a boy his age to have one bottle of soap to do it all. The other day, I walked in his room and asked what smelled so good - I thought he'd brought one of my expensive diffusers upstairs or something like that! Then I realized he'd just gotten out of the shower and it was him that smelled so wonderful.It also makes a great hand soap - smells wonderful and luxurious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shampoo Ever (For Me, Anyway. YMMV)
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR: Fantastic shampoo for straight, slightly oily hair; really good body wash that smells nice in the bath/shower and effectively leaves no discernable scent behind. Doesn't overdry my skin. Lathers well even in water that's basically liquid limestone. Good price, too. A rare 10/10.---The Details---I. As Shampoo-This is my all-time favorite shampoo & body wash. I'd use it for shampoo even if I didn't like it as a body wash, because it leaves my hair clean, light (as opposed to heavy), silky, and shiny without excessively stripping the oils from my scalp.I don't find it necessary to use any kind of conditioner with it, either, which is nice, because my hair tends to be a little oily and using conditioner means that after a dayn in the studio (I'm a dancer, and I swear a LOT), it's already kinda gross.-II. Scent-If you want something that leaves a detectable scent behind, this isn't the ideal product for you. It smells lovely (but not overpowering) while you're showering or bathing, but just leaves you smelling like a clean human.This is perfect for me, as I enjoy a nice-smelling bath or shower as much the next person, but don't want to smell like anything in the ballet studio, where we're all breathing hard and scented products can trigger asthma attacks, etc.-III. Moisturizing?-As for moisturizing, I wouldn't call this a moisturizing body wash. Rather, it dries your skin less than most; it might actually just be completely neutral in that regard. That's fine with me. If my skin feels dry, I use lotion.Your mileage may vary, however—our water is so hard it's basically mineral water, so this stuff night behave differently if your water is soft, for example.-IV. Value-Depending on how often I shower or bathe, a bottle of this lasts me from 1 to 2 months, maybe longer? I never think to write down the date I start using a new one, but I will next time I do so I can report back with actual useful information.-V. Rating-Even though I only tend to review products I either hate or love, there are few I'd call a 10 out of 10. This is one of them.Because hair types and bodies differ, it might not be a 10/10 for you, but it's worth a try if you're looking for a new shampoo or body wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EO 3 in 1 soap is a better brand ive tried
reviews.reviewText: Everyone 3 in 1 soap citrus and mint doesn't have much of a smell. That's exactly what i wanted. Lasts very long time. Been using for years. It's not drying, but wouldn't say moisturizing, more neutral. can use all the time and sent doesn't compete with any of my essential oils i use in my lotion which is also EO non scented and very moisturizing, clean feel, not greasy and you can add any scent to the moisturizer you want or not. Will continue to buy both products! My skin is sensitive and loves Everyone brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2018
reviews.reviewText: The citrus mint is a mild scent. It lathers well. While I have not used it for shamooo on myself I have used it on my yorkie. It worked well to get his hair clean. I have always been careful to use a different tear free shampoo on his face; since this is not tear free, I did use a separate shampoo for his head. I’ve always used human shampoo on him since dog shampoo does not work well on yorkie’s hair. I like that it is organic; I don’t worry about it being harmful to his skin etc. I think in a pinch I could use it as shampoo, but I really require a moisturizing shampoo for my dry hair. I use it as shower gel and feel that it lathers and cleans well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value, refreshing scent
reviews.reviewText: Shipped fast, priced right, and I like the scent. For guys, it doubles well as a shampoo and body wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent choice for your rental property
reviews.reviewText: I have a monthly subscription for this product and I love everything about it. The pump is very durable and can last. I use this product on my rental properties and it is more cost efficient than having small soap and shampoo. I would definitely recommend this for your rental property.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am a simple girl, I use this for my entire shower needs. Its not a strong odor and leaves my skin feeling soft. My hair feels great as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT FOR HIGHLY SENSITIVE SKIN
reviews.reviewText: EXZEMA is a problem for millions. This leaves a clean fresh feeling without any residue or perfumes. It is SOOTHING to wash with, unlike many other soaps.
Para mi lugar que rento, está excelente, solo este aroma no me gustó mucho, huele a detergente de trastes de limón, por lo demás es muy práctico.
Excellent value and the kids love the scent.
Feels like it cleans well and smells great
